| File | Purpose |

| [architecture.md](architecture.md) | Overall structure and relationships |

## Commands Quick Reference

| Command | Agent | Purpose | Output |
|---------|-------|---------|--------|
| `/plan` | planner | Implementation planning | Plan document |
| `/architect` | architect | System design, ADRs | ADR document |
| `/tdd` | tdd-guide | Test-driven development | Tests + code |
| `/cr` | code-reviewer | Code review via Codex | P1/P2/P3 feedback |
| `/code-invs` | codebase-investigator | Read-only analysis | `notes/*.md` |
| `/refactor-clean` | refactor-cleaner | Dead code cleanup | `.reports/*.md` |
| `/update-codemaps` | codemap-updater | Architecture docs | `codemaps/*.md` |
| `/e2e` | e2e-browser | Browser E2E testing | `artifacts/*` |

## Skills Quick Reference

| Skill | Trigger | Purpose |
|-------|---------|---------|
| reflect | `/reflect`, "remember this" | Extract rules from corrections |

## Agents by Category

### Development Workflow

| Agent | Model | Description |
|-------|-------|-------------|
| planner | opus | Feature planning, step breakdown |
| tdd-guide | opus | Test-first implementation |
| code-reviewer | inherit | External review via Codex |

### Architecture & Analysis

| Agent | Model | Description |
|-------|-------|-------------|
| architect | opus | System design, trade-offs, ADRs |
| codebase-investigator | inherit | Read-only code exploration |
| codemap-updater | opus | Architecture documentation |

### Maintenance

| Agent | Model | Description |
|-------|-------|-------------|
| refactor-cleaner | opus | Dead code cleanup (Python/Go/JS) |

### Testing

| Agent | Model | Description |
|-------|-------|-------------|
| e2e-browser | opus | Chrome browser E2E tests |

## Key Paths

| Path | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `commands/` | Slash command definitions |
| `agents/*/agent.md` | Agent implementations |
| `skills/*/SKILL.md` | Skill implementations |
| `templates/` | File templates for skills |
| `~/.claude/` | Installation target |
| `.claude/` | Project-local config |

## Language Support

| Agent | Python | Go | JS/TS | Other |
|-------|--------|-----|-------|-------|
| refactor-cleaner | vulture, dead | deadcode, staticcheck | knip, depcheck | - |
| codemap-updater | pyproject.toml | go.mod | package.json | Rust (Cargo.toml) |

## External Dependencies

| Agent | External Tool | Purpose |
|-------|---------------|---------|
| code-reviewer | OpenAI Codex | AI-powered code review |
| e2e-browser | Chrome MCP | Browser automation |
| refactor-cleaner | vulture/knip/etc | Dead code detection |
